name: Classic Margherita Pizza
instructions: Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out the pizza dough to the desired size.
Spread a thin layer of tomato sauce on the dough.
Top with fresh mozzarella slices and basil leaves.
Drizzle olive oil and bake for 10-12 minutes.

name: Butter Chicken
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt, spices, and lemon juice for 1 hour.
Cook the chicken in a hot pan until lightly browned.
Prepare a tomato-based sauce with butter, cream, and spices.
Simmer the chicken in the sauce for 20 minutes.

name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Roast sweet potatoes and chickpeas with olive oil and spices.
Arrange quinoa, roasted vegetables, and greens in a bowl.
Top with avocado, tahini dressing, and a sprinkle of seeds.

name: Ayurvedic Kitchari
instructions: Cook rice and mung dal in a pot with water, turmeric, and ginger.
Simmer for 30-40 minutes until soft.
Add ghee, spices like cumin and coriander, and cook for a few minutes.

name: Tandoori Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, tandoori spices, and lemon juice.
Grill or bake the chicken for 30-40 minutes at high heat.
Serve with naan or rice.

name: Mango Lassi
instructions: Blend mango, yogurt (or vegan yogurt), ice, and a touch of sugar.
Serve chilled in glasses.

name: Chana Masala
instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger in oil.
Add tomatoes, spices, and cook until the tomatoes break down.
Add cooked chickpeas and simmer with water for 15 minutes.

name: Vegetable Biryani
instructions: Sauté onions and spices in ghee or oil.
Add mixed vegetables and cook for a few minutes.
Add soaked rice, water, and cook until tender.

name: Paneer Tikka
instructions: Marinate paneer cubes in yogurt and tandoori spices for 30 minutes.
Grill or bake the paneer until lightly charred.
Serve with chutney or salad.

name: Aloo Gobi
instructions: Cook potatoes and cauliflower with spices in oil.
Simmer until tender, and serve with roti or rice.
